agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Culture, Recreation & Tourism TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 12, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. John Cyrier HB 329 Nevárez Relating to concurrent state and federal jurisdiction over units of the national park system in this state. HB 1300 Hunter | et al. Relating to cultivated oyster mariculture; authorizing fees; creating a criminal offense. HB 1422 Paddie Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas Historical Commission. HB 1628 Morrison Relating to the authority of coastal counties to adopt certain rules for island parks, beach parks, and public beaches; creating a criminal offense. HB 1962 Lambert Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas State Library and Archives Commission. *The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. Public testimony may be limited to three (3) minutes per individual.* NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
